nodes.text: Jolka was a male Zabrak mechanic who was present at Tansarii Point Station sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY. During this time, he did maintenance on R2-D2.

Jolka appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
